column4: what is the diference between ubuntu server and ubuntu alternate?
Ubuntu Server gives you a server system, e.g. no GUI, no bloat. Alternate installs a desktop just like the live CD would.
if i were to install a "text mode system" from the alt cd, would it be the same as a server system?
there would still be some differences; Ubuntu Server doesn't ship with some packages and just installs a bare minimum of sorts to get your server installation going ....
